text: [Music]
welcome back
today we'll be talking about shipping
and receiving at los polos hermanos we
rely on our vendors to supply us with
fresh delicious ingredients that we
prepare for our guests
between our proto suppliers here in
albuquerque
and
our partners down in mexico
we receive shipments from all over the
world it's a vast network that requires
careful coordination
allow me to show you how it works los
pollos hermanos owns a fleet of trucks
that make regular deliveries to our
restaurants before we send out a truck
we record both destination and cargo in
our shipping logs for added security
many los poyos hermanos trucks are
equipped with tracking devices so we
know where they are at all times
now let's check out a shipment before
you can accept a delivery you must check
it against the shipping manifest you
must be certain that nothing is missing
from time to time you may encounter
items that are not on the shipping
manifest if this occurs do not attempt
to move or open the container in
question contact your supervisor and he
or she will ensure it reaches its proper
destination once the shipment is deemed
acceptable you can begin taking
inventory but that's a lesson for
another time for now keep up the good
work and i'll see you next week when
we'll be tackling customer service
[Music]
you
